about_the_game:
This game is a "Deck-Building Liver Development Card Game."
You will nurture aspiring livestreamers (Livers) and help them become outstanding Livers. The deadline is two weeks.
The goal is to earn as many LP (Liver Points) as possible.
To achieve this, you must use your cards efficiently and build an optimized deck.

  • You start with a set of predetermined cards.

  • Use these cards to acquire more cards from the field = Deck-Building.
    (Cards become stronger when leveled up.)

  • Simultaneously, you will need to raise the Liver's stats.
    (Card effects are enhanced based on the Liver's stats.)

  • At the end of each turn, LP (Liver Points) will be awarded based on the Liver's stats.

The title screen in the game includes a "Tutorial."
If you're unsure about anything, check the specific section of the "Tutorial."
(There are not only images but also videos, so feel free to watch them.)

  • Not sure what to do?
    Read the "Game Objective" section.
    Then, go through the sections under "What You Can Do During Your Turn" in order.

  • Don't understand the layout of the field?
    Check the "Understanding the Field" section.

  • Unsure how to read the cards?
    Look at the "About Cards" section.

  • What are Liver's stats?
    Review the "About Liver's Stats" section.

"Contact us here:

Email

detailed_description:
This game is a "Deck-Building Liver Development Card Game."
You will nurture aspiring livestreamers (Livers) and help them become outstanding Livers. The deadline is two weeks.
The goal is to earn as many LP (Liver Points) as possible.
To achieve this, you must use your cards efficiently and build an optimized deck.

  • You start with a set of predetermined cards.

  • Use these cards to acquire more cards from the field = Deck-Building.
    (Cards become stronger when leveled up.)

  • Simultaneously, you will need to raise the Liver's stats.
    (Card effects are enhanced based on the Liver's stats.)

  • At the end of each turn, LP (Liver Points) will be awarded based on the Liver's stats.

The title screen in the game includes a "Tutorial."
If you're unsure about anything, check the specific section of the "Tutorial."
(There are not only images but also videos, so feel free to watch them.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 2～4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card (also works with integrated graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500MB～1GB GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card
